TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 88
TEI.2.document_title: Gaspar Flores to Stephen F Austin, 08-07-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Gaspar Flores to S. M. Williams, August 7, 1828. Thinks governor will approve appointment of Williams to be secretary of the ayuntamiento. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 88

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Gaspar Flores to S. M. Williams, August 7, 1828. Thinks governor will approve appointment of Williams to be secretary of the ayuntamiento. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="08-07-1828"> August 7, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
